modName: Irileth Whiterun Housecarl to the Jarl
summary: Changes: Skin Tone which is a dark elf skin tone in the CK, used same face just made it better in my opinion, eye color, hair, and added makeup, and kept her war paint the same,and default outfit is changed to Glass Armor. I also gave her female stance instead of male.
descriptionHtml:
Changes: Skin Tone which is a dark elf skin tone in the CK, used same face just made it better in my opinion, eye color, hair, and added makeup, and kept her war paint the same,and default outfit is changed to Glass Armor. I also gave her female stance instead of male.

Every thing done to this NPC should work plain vanilla don't need recommended mods.

Permission: feel free to do what you want with this mod.(Just please give credit for my work).

If you want her to look like she does in the screen shots you will need Better Females By Bella and Makeup option 4 or choose any makeup option you want is up to you.

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1253706

Makeup options:

Makeup Type 1
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1469902

Makeup Type 2
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1626052

Makeup Type 3
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1638469

Makeup Type 4
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1637867

Less Makeup
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1640355

Shiny Forhead Remover - Unable to verify what this add on from her mod actually does. I added it in anyway in case you are familiar with this and know what to do with it.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1643751

NotReallyAnUpdate Update 4!
If you like the look, but wish it had a little something extra, try loading Xenius Character Enhancement AFTER this mod, has some really nice results!
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=14668446


I also use this mod but you do not need it if you do not want it (Adult content mod Warrning) Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- by Caliente.

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

Here are the links for the armor and the armor retexture that she wares in the screen shots.

Skimpy Glass Armor Using CBBE by Killer Keo
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3553



optional if you want it nice armor.
Silverlight Armor
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10251

and
Silvernight Amor Retexture for Silverlight Armor
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15329

There is also an other add on to that armor mod that adds a clothes version for mages if you would like that as well here is the link to it .

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14035

If you get the grey face bug there is nothing I can do for you that is an in game bug and the only fix I know of is to save shut game down to desktop and reload your save.


Thank you and I hope you like it and enjoy.
author: Caldargo
